channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
my run.bat file is this i have Jdk 18
@echo off title server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server exit
i get this error
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
can some one post what my run.bat file should look like

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

It should look like that, you dont have any Path settings though.

If you want, you can replace java with

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_JDKVERSION\bin\java.exe”

You have to change the JDKVERSION to your JDK update version, 18 is the newest one. Also, depending on your computer, it may be Program Files (x86)

Read full topic
